title: Readout of the President's Meeting with Prime Minister Harper of Canada | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 26, 2011

 



Readout of the President's Meeting with Prime Minister Harper of Canada




Earlier today, President Obama and Prime Minister Harper met on the margins of the G-8 and discussed the implementation of their Shared Vision for Perimeter Security and Economic Competitiveness as well as progress through the U.S.-Canada Regulatory Cooperation Council. These efforts are focused on strengthening U.S. and Canadian security and competitiveness. The leaders underscored the importance of both efforts and committed to continuing this important work.
